name: Second Chance (itch) (Amin Montazeri)
description:
💢Why did I do that sin?! 😞
How to prove that I deserve a second chance?🤔

Movement>>>  "W A S D"
Jump\Room rotation>>>   "SPACE"
Run>>>   "SHIFT"

💢Some information: Modeling: Rhino Programing: PlayMaker(visual scripting) Audio: "Suspense in the Shadows" from AudioJungle (BG msuic) and Attack Jump & Hit Damage Human Sounds (free) Other assets I used: Paid: DoozyUI- Camera Filter Pack- Aura 2 Free: FirstPersion AIO Pack- EasyFpsCounter
